rating_comment: Great place. Everything matched the description. Peaceful location with market nearby. Sarbari is a good host.
Very beautiful house just like the pics and a very responsive host. Had a great overnight stay on our stop over to Bangalore. Thanks Sarbari.

It was a great experience staying here. The host, Sarbari was very helpful, generous, and was continuously in touch with us to ensure we weren’t facing any issues. The house was very neat and tidy. Travelling a lot makes our life tedious however this stay was very homely and had a great vibe. Will be visiting here again when I come back.

A very cozy Airbnb to spend 2 nights, right in the heart of Siliguri. Woods and Hills are a property in a gated community, with a dedicated parking space the home is very aesthetic, the living room is large with a lot of seating space and a TV, (We enjoyed MI hammer RCB) the home has nice wall paper and great colour combination giving out a good aura and it faces a beautiful nursery, the bed room is comfortable with a nice mattress and quilt, the linens are very clean, toilets are spic and span, the kitchen is set up well with utensils, cutlery and a cooking induction, there is a clean washing machine perfect for us Road Trippers. The dining table is beautifully set up for a good meal, the place gives a great sense of living in your home. Last but not the least Sarbari is an excellent host, we got so carried away, we ended up having a conversation for an hour, from start to finish she will make you feel welcome and that’s all you can ask for when you wanna relax.

This was my first time staying in an Airbnb and has changed my perception on Airbnb completely . Cleanliness, prompt response, clear instructions and a personal touch... very thoughtful and probably more professionally managed than many hotels I have stayed in...apartment is extremely well maintained , pest controlled...soft towel, super comfy bed and blanket, spacious , enough parking are a few points to be highlighted...Ideal for traveling with family and kids ...the location is well connected yet calm... Zomato delivered real fast as Sevoke road is just 2 mins ...Sarbari also helped me with local Taxi and toto... thank you Sarbari for making my stay so comfortable...would definitely come back ...
Sarbari was a great host. We were a family of four and all of us really enjoyed our stay. Sarbari is one the best host we ever had. I recommend her place 100%. Thank you for all your help Sarbari!!

Not happy with the service. The location is too far from the main road and also kind of in a secluded place. Hard to get vehicles from this place. The host was not considerate at all and created problems in proving iron, linens and you have just one remote for 4 AC's in the house. Too many mosquitoes and you can not even open the windows as there are no mesh. The places was well maintianed and good but not happy with the service and the amount paid

The apartment was extremely clean and neat the furniture that they have chosen is very new. The entire house looks extremely new with some great decor and wallhangings. The kitchen is clean and has everything to make a breakfast or a great dinner. The bed linen is very comfortable, and they have provided ample blankets. If you feel cold, the location is extremely pleasant and silent and in a walk distance, you have small eat outs or chai places.

We were transiting through Siliguri and found Sarbari’s place is exactly as described. Perfect for a shorter stay as well as longer staycations- the place is well laid out, well stocked and easy to find. Sarbari is the most friendly and communicative host I have met in a while, reminded me of a time when you would actually get to know the person behind the place. Well worth it, and we will meet again.

Great Host, Great Place and good location
Highly recommended, particularly for families and friends
Very clean and comfortable place with a friendly host. Would recommend! 👍🏽

I loved my stay at Mrs Sarbari's place. It was a cute Airbnb. Felt right at home. Cozy feeling in the bedrooms. The bathrooms were clean and really nice. The TV was good. I stayed with my parents. A great place for staying with family.
Sarbari has a nice self service apartment in Siliguri. She was also very helpful in suggesting all places to visit/things to do. Would recommend.

Rooms are well maintained & having all the basic amenities including WiFi network.
Overall experience was great & Sarbari is a great host.

Very comfortable stay , worth the price .
Everything about this place is exactly chic and as shown in the photos . It was wonderful stay . Thankyou so much Sarbani for understanding and hosting us. Highly recommend this place.
Behavior of the host was very nice and very much reponsive in my query...
it's feel like home beautiful host
host was really nice and always happy to help. great place

It was a pleasant stay. I visited with my family. We really like the place, it was exactly as mentioned, clean, and well-appointed.
Thank you so much Sarbari, We really appreciate all the effort you put into and help us to make our stay comfortable, we will definitely recommend you to friends and family.

Had booked the property for my father and his friends and they were all in awe of the place . Sarbari was really helpful and everything in the apartment was exactly how its shown in the pictures.
Thank you for making their stay so comfortable and being a super host :)
Sarbari Chanda was an excellent host, and the stay was great! Comfy rooms made for a perfect experience. Highly recommend!
Great helpful and friendly host
The location was bit outside of the main city. To commute it’s super expensive. Other than that place was really well maintained. The host is super friendly and in all it was a good experience.

Hi, I had a stay at Sarbari's house a few days back. we were 6 adults and 2 kids. Here is my overall feedback.
1. Sarbari is very responsive. This was very impressive and was one of the reasons for me to choose this place over other
2. She gave clear instructions to her her house. While we still lost but she tried her best for the smooth experience.
3. She was constantly in touch with us that shows she cares for her clients
4. She helped us with the local cuisine and the roam around places.
5. overall we had a great stay at her place.
Point to note the flat is on the second floor that I missed rechecking.
